column1: #: name: Spectrum analysis: IBD spectrum in antineutrino energy

column2: given with 20 antineutrino energy bins (bins 1-19 are 250 keV wide
column3: with centers ranging from 2.5 MeV to 7 MeV and bin 20 is 750 keV wide with center at 7.5 MeV). The prediction from Huber multiplied by the IBD cross section is also given.
